Method Detail

checkNonnegativeTextField

public static boolean checkNonnegativeTextField(java.awt.Component callingComponent,
                                                javax.swing.text.JTextComponent textField,
                                                java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                java.lang.String appName)
Check whether the text field had a non negative integer input, and show an error message if not.

Parameters:
callingComponent - The component where the function is called.
textField - Text field containing the text needed to check against.
fieldName - The name of the field, used for showing error message.
appName - The application name, used as title of the error message.
Returns:
True if input is valid, false otherwise.

checkPositiveTextField

public static boolean checkPositiveTextField(java.awt.Component callingComponent,
                                             javax.swing.text.JTextComponent textField,
                                             java.lang.String fieldName,
                                             java.lang.String appName)
Check whether the text field had a positive integer input, and show an error message if not.

Parameters:
callingComponent - The component where the function is called.
textField - Text field containing the text needed to check against.
fieldName - The name of the field, used for showing error message.
appName - The application name, used as title of the error message.
Returns:
True if input is valid, false otherwise.
